properties.name: application.elasticsearch.index
properties.description: Name of the active elasticsearch index.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.uri
properties.description: Elasticsearch URI (protocol://host:port).

properties.name: application.baseUrl
properties.description: The base for building URLs in e-mails, for example 'https://einnsyn.no', 'https://test.einnsyn.no'.

properties.name: application.email.from
properties.description: The from: address for emails sent by the application.

properties.name: application.integrasjonspunkt.orgnummer
properties.description: ORG number for the integrasjonspunkt.

properties.name: application.integrasjonspunkt.expectedResponseTimeoutDays
properties.description: Integrasjonspunkt 'expectedResponseTimeoutDays'.

properties.name: application.integrasjonspunkt.moveUrl
properties.description: Integrasjonspunkt 'application.moveUrl'.

properties.name: application.userSecretExpirationTime
properties.description: Time before a user secret expires.

properties.name: application.innsynskrav.retryInterval
properties.description: Interval between retries after failed innsynskrav-sending.

properties.name: application.innsynskrav.anonymousMaxAge
properties.description: Maximum age, in days, before email addresses are removed from anonymous InnsynskravBestillings.

properties.name: application.jwt.encryption-secret
properties.description: JWT Secret. This must be a 256 bit HMAC hash in base64 encoding. Generate using `openssl rand -base64 32`

properties.name: application.jwt.accessTokenExpiration
properties.description: JWT access token expiration time.

properties.name: application.jwt.refreshTokenExpiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time.

properties.name: application.apikey.root-key
properties.description: ID of the root API key.

properties.name: application.apikey.root-secret
properties.description: Default root API secret. This is used to initialize a fresh database, and may be changed later.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.getBatchSize
properties.description: The batch size for checking if ES documents exists in the database.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.indexBatchSize
properties.description: The batch size for indexing new documents.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.cron.update-outdated
properties.description: Schedule for updating outdated ES documents

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.cron.removeStale
properties.description: Schedule for removing documents from ES that are not in the database.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.concurrency
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent index() requests to elasticsearch.

properties.name: application.innsynskrav.cleanSchedule
properties.description: Cron schedule for cleaning old innsynskrav entries.

properties.name: application.innsynskrav.debugRecipient
properties.description: An optional email address to which all innsynskrav requests are sent, regardless of the actual recipient.

properties.name: application.innsynskrav.verificationQuarantineHours
properties.description: Number of hours before an anonymous user can send another request, before verifying the previous one(s).

properties.name: application.innsynskrav.verificationQuarantineLimit
properties.description: Number of unverified requests allowed within the quarantine hours.

properties.name: application.legacyLagretSoekConversion.dry-run
properties.description: true/false. Defaults to true. If true, the legacy lagret søk conversion will not actually update any data, but will log what it would have done. Set to false to perform the actual conversion.

properties.name: application.legacyLagretSoekConversion.interval
properties.description: Time interval (ISO 8601 duration) for running the legacy lagret søk conversion. Defaults to PT1H.

properties.name: application.legacyLagretSoekConversion.initialDelay
properties.description: Initial delay before running the legacy lagret søk conversion. Defaults to PT1M.
